oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Saatgut und Forschung für den Ökologischen Landbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tilcher, Ralf
Schmidt, Walter
Altenweger, Axel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
"Organics" in general
Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: KWS SAAT AG offers seed of corn, cereals, potato, oil seed rape and sugar beet to organic farmers. The company is orientated towards the needs of its customers and is technically and logistically able to provide organic agriculture with high quality seed produced in accordance with the official organic rules. Besides the supply of seed, the company is conducting research in the areas of breeding, seed treatment and plant production methods focusing on the needs of organic farming. Since 2002, KWS is operating its own organic farm, the KWS Klos-tergut Wiebrechtshausen GmbH, in form of a wholly owned subsidiary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tilcher, Ralf; Schmidt, Walter and Altenweger, Axel (2007) Saatgut und Forschung für den Ökologischen Landbau. [Seed and research for organic farming.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
